item.description:
Hi Everyone

For May's brunch I'd like to return to Independence Harbor in Assonet Ma.

A great brunch buffet at a beautiful 20 acre private estate.

$21.00 per person

Independence Harbor only serves brunch on the 1st Sunday of each month so I'm posting it early to give everyone plenty of advance notice that we'll be "off schedule" in May.

Here's their website so you can check them out.

http://www.ihweddings.com/sundaybrunch.html

 

Sunday Brunch Menu

May 5, 2013

A Carving Station of Roast Strip Sirloin of Beef with Horseradish Cream and Bordelaise Sauces
Spice Encrusted Baked Ham with Maple Mustard Sauce
Breast of Chicken Marsala (Mushrooms and Marsala Wine)
Seafood Fettuccini with Lobster Cream Sauce
Baked Cheese Manicotti with Sauteed Garden Vegetables
Classic Scrambled Eggs
Eggs Benedict
Deep Fried Apple Filled French Toast
Home Fried Red Bliss Potatoes
Pork Sausage Links
Chef's Seasonal Vegetable Medley
Fresh Fruit and Salad Buffets
Home-baked Breads and Pastry Buffet

Proper Dress Please

Gratuities are not included
item.name: May Brunch - Independence Harbor in Assonet
